templates.tempBody:
Hello ${clientsName},

We just wanted to confirm your appointment for ${dogsName} on ${date}.  We look forward to seeing you then.  If you have any questions please feel free to contact us.

Thanks Again, 

Your Grooming Team

Hello ${clientsName},

We have received your request to change ${dogsName}'s next grooming appointment on ${date}.  We will be in contact within 48 hours with a new date.

Thanks,

Your Grooming Team
